archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Report Party Orders
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Monitor the status of party orders, provide notifications of any changes and provide management reports

properties.value: The objective of the Report Party processes is to monitor the status of party orders, provide notifications of any changes and provide management reports. These processes are responsible for continuously monitoring the status of party orders and managing notifications to processes and other parties registered to receive notifications of any status changes. Notification lists are managed and maintained by the Support Party Order processes. These processes record, analyze and assess the party order status changes to provide management reports and any specialized summaries of the efficiency and effectiveness of the overall Party Order process. These specialized summaries could be specific reports required by specific audiences.
